document_data.mainbody:
The Ratclaw was an independent Sembian caravel that sailed the Sea of Fallen Stars during the 14 century DR. It was captained by Strauph Omerehellin.
In Ches of 1357 DR the Ratclaw left the port of Selgaunt, en route to Hillsfar, packed with dates, nuts and olive oil from the cities of the south. While it was due to dock in the port city of the Moonsea eight days after setting sail, it failed to arrive at its destination.
